title: Gauley River National Recreation Area: Park Home
body: Wild and Wonderful  The 25 miles of free-flowing Gauley River and the six miles of the Meadow River pass through scenic gorges and valleys containing a wide variety of natural and cultural features. The Gauley River contains several class V+ rapids, making it one of the most adventurous white water boating rivers in the east. Read More             Whitewater   Paddling the Gauley River is an exciting, adrenaline filled experience, attracting people from all over to enjoy the river.          Stay Safe On And Near The River   Staying safe on the Gauley River is important, whether you are boating, fishing, camping of hiking. Plan ahead and always wear a life jacket
